title: Pyke has grey health = to his entire HP bar at rank 1...
body: Come on. Why must this cheese clown have basically full hp recovery that NEVER FADES. I am sitting her poking him and his grey health is literally at like 95% hp when he is sitting at 60%. What kind of r%%%%%ed crap is this. He blows away every other champion in the game on sustain while having some of the most toxic engage mechanics ever created.

replies.body:
Yeah, that didn't happen.

The max grey HP is going to be either

* 80 (+800% bonus AD)
* 60% max HP

At level 1 he's not exactly going to have much in the way of bonus AD.
4 from Targons, 12 from runes.

This means he stores up to 208 health.
In order to store this much, he needs to accumulate 693 damage taken from enemy champions.

Pyke has 600 HP at level 1.
They can downvote you but they can't downvote the truth.
They hated him because he spoke the truth. I hate Pyke's grey health myself but I know it can't be as bad as OP is saying.
